Plot: A news team is sent to Burundi to capture and bring home a legendary 25-foot crocodile. Their difficult task turns potentially deadly when a warlord targets them for death.
Title: Primeval
Actors: Dominic Purcell, Brooke Langton, Orlando Jones, Jürgen Prochnow
tomatoConsensus: Primeval is a low-quality horror film, which due to the inane political messages does not even qualify as campy fun.
